document_data.caption: A tyrannosaurus wreaking havoc on riders.
document_data.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
document_data.othernames: Fang Titan Drake,{{Cite organized play/LJ/Ship from the Sky|2}}
document_data.mainbody: A '''tyrannosaurus rex''', sometimes improperly called a '''fang titan drake''', or as '''gnasher''' by the people of the [[Malatran Plateau]], was a carnivorous species of [[dinosaur]].
document_data.Description: Tyrannosauruses were enormous predators, with large heads that measured {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}} long with teeth that were {{SIrange|3|6|inches|long=yes}} in length. Despite their enormous size, they were known to be fast runners.
document_data.Behavior: Tyrannosaurs were not greatly intelligent and their savage nature could occasionally lead them to doing self-destructive acts, such as swallowing the horned head of a [[triceratops]] whole.
document_data.Reputation: Among those who knew of dinosaurs, tyrannosaurs were considered to be some of the most fearsome and dreadful of carnivorous dinosaurs.

Ecology.Diet: Tyrannosaurs were a carnivorous species that hunted any creature they considered edible, and were terrors to all other creatures in their territory. If prey was scarce, a tyrannosaurus could survive on carrion and smaller creatures.
Ecology.Habitats:
Tyrannosaurs were primarily known to inhabit the jungles of [[Chult]] and the Malatran Plateau.

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some could be found in the [[Forbidden Plateau (divine realm)|Forbidden Plateau]], the [[divine realm]] of [[Thard Harr]].
Ecology.Usages: The fangs of these creatures were highly valued by collectors outside of Chult.

document_data.History:
In the early-14{{th}} century [[DR]], a tyrannosaur devoured the adventuring companions of [[Elijah Moonspeak]].

During the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]], the [[deity]] [[Ubtao]] stalked the jungles of [[Chult]] in the form of a tyrannosaur and battled the snake god [[Sseth]].
document_data.Notable Tyrannosaurs:
* [[Big Honker]], a racing dinosaur from [[Port Nyanzaru]].
* [[Scarback]], another racing dinosaur from the same city.
* The [[King of Feathers]], the powerful tyrannosaurus that dwelled within the ruined city of [[Omu]].
document_data.Trivia: The deity Ubtao's [[avatar]] form was that of an enormous tyrannosaurus rex, over twice its normal size. And as dinosaurs, tyrannosaurs were believed to be among the Children of Ubtao.
